General.Name: Histeel
General.Description: Histeel Co.,Ltd. produces and sells steel pipes and tubes in South Korea. It offers line, pressure, and structural pipes, as well as pipe piles; and square, ordinary, and automotive pipes. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

2.Name: Yong-Taek  Kwon
2.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Exec. Director
